snippet: Interior Secretary Ken Salazar will leave President Obama’s cabinet by March, creating another opening for the president to fill as he begins his second term.
abstract: Interior Secretary Ken Salazar will step down in March 2013.
lead_paragraph: Interior Secretary Ken Salazar will leave President Obama’s cabinet by March, creating another opening for the president to fill as he begins his second term.

headline.seo: Ken Salazar to Leave Interior Post by March
headline.main: Interior Secretary to Step Down in March
headline.print_headline: Interior Secretary to Step Down in March
